title: Heaven and the Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/15/18
itunes:title: Heaven and the Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/15/18
description:
George Noory and experimental psychologist Michael Shermer debate the belief in heaven and the afterlife, and his skepticism as to whether it actually exists because there is no scientific proof.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
George Noory and experimental psychologist Michael Shermer debate the belief in heaven and the afterlife, and his skepticism as to whether it actually exists because there is no scientific proof.
